01.query:
PREFIX aat: <http://vocab.getty.edu/page/aat/>
PREFIX crm: <http://www.cidoc-crm.org/cidoc-crm/>
PREFIX crmdig: <http://www.ics.forth.gr/isl/CRMdig/>
PREFIX ex: <https://w3id.org/dharc/ontology/chad-ap/data/example/>
PREFIX lrmoo: <http://iflastandards.info/ns/lrm/lrmoo/> 
PREFIX rdfs: <http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#>

SELECT DISTINCT ?title ?desc
WHERE {
  VALUES (?item_id) { (<<<uri1>>>) }
  ?manifestation lrmoo:R7i_is_exemplified_by ?item_id .
  ?expression lrmoo:R4i_is_embodied_in ?manifestation .
  ?work lrmoo:R3_is_realised_in ?expression ;
        crm:P102_has_title ?title_id.
  ?title_id crm:P190_has_symbolic_content ?title .

  FILTER (lang(?title) = "en")
  ?item_id crm:P3_has_note ?desc .
}
